resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105954</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105954</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085821</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Evaluating multimedia presentations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswertende Multimediadarstellungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentations d'évaluation de multimédia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentações de avaliação dos multimedia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazioni di valutazione di multimedia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αξιολόγηση των παρουσιάσεων πολυμέσων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentaciones de evaluación de las multimedias</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A PowerPoint presentation is just another form of communication, and the same rules apply to multimedia that apply to writing or verbal communication. This article offers guidelines for using and assigning multimedia presentations in the classroom a</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine PowerPoint Darstellung ist ein anderes 
Formular der Kommunikation gerecht, und die gleichen Richtlinien 
treffen auf Multimedia zu, die auf Schreiben oder mündliche 
Kommunikation zutreffen. Dieser Artikel bietet Korrekturlinien 
für das Verwenden und das Zuweisen von von Multimediadarstellungen im
Klassenzimmer a an</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation de PowerPoint est juste une 
autre forme de transmission, et les mêmes règles s'appliquent aux 
multimédia qui s'appliquent à l'écriture ou à la transmission 
verbale. Cet article offre des directives pour utiliser et 
assigner des présentations de multimédia dans la salle de classe a</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação de PowerPoint é justa um outro
formulário de uma comunicação, e as mesmas réguas aplicam-se aos 
multimedia que se aplicam à escrita ou a uma comunicação verbal. 
Este artigo oferece guidelines para usar e atribuir 
apresentações dos multimedia na sala de aula a</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione del PowerPoint è giusta 
un'altra forma della comunicazione e le stesse regole si applicano 
alle multimedia che si applicano a scrittura o alla comunicazione 
verbale. Questo articolo offre la guida di riferimento per 
usando e l'assegnazione delle presentazioni di multimedia nell'aula a</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια παρουσίαση PowerPoint είναι ακριβώς μια άλλη 
μορφή της επικοινωνίας, και οι ίδιοι κανόνες ισχύουν για τα 
πολυμέσα που ισχύουν για το γράψιμο ή τη λεκτική επικοινωνία. 
Αυτό το άρθρο προσφέρει τις οδηγίες για τη χρησιμοποίηση 
και να αναθέσει των παρουσιάσεων πολυμέσων στην τάξη α</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación de PowerPoint es justa otra 
forma de comunicación, y las mismas reglas se aplican a las 
multimedias que se aplican a la escritura o a la comunicación verbal.
Este artículo ofrece las guías de consulta para usar y asignar
presentaciones de las multimedias en la sala de clase a</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID WALBERT
FN:DAVID WALBERT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085821</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105954</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/evaluating-multimedia-presentations</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
